thread.title: KAthleen Hansen

author: KAthleen Hansen
title: KAthleen Hansen
text: I had the most amazing online shopping experience with this company. I hesitated, but caved in. AM glad I did. The craftsmanship is fabulous, the company reps are very polite and prompt at answering questions, and the deliverymen did a great job at letting me know about delivery timing. You really can't ask for more. I love my sideboard.
